content.prompt: Which of the following demographic changes occurred in the United States in the three decades after 1965 ?

choices.label: A shift in population from the South and West to the North and East
An increase in the proportion of people over the age of sixty-five
A decline in the proportion of people who lived in suburbs

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
